pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast and Portable Character String Processing Facilities // A collection of character string/text/natural language processing tools for pattern searching (e.g., with 'Java'-like regular expressions or the 'Unicode' collation algorithm), random string generation, case mapping, string transliteration, concatenation, sorting, padding, wrapping, Unicode normalisation, date-time formatting and parsing, and many more. They are fast, consistent, convenient, and - thanks to 'ICU' (International Components for Unicode) - portable across all locales and platforms. Documentation about 'stringi' is provided via its website at https://stringi.gagolewski.com/ and the paper by Gagolewski (2022, doi:10.18637/jss.v103.i02).
